metadata.title: PM meets Jordan king; lauds role in safe return of flotilla detainees

content.article_body: SHARM EL SHEIKH, Oct 13 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday held an informal exchange on the sidelines of Gaza Peace Summit here wherein he acknowledged Jordan's facilitation in ensuring the safe return of detainees from the Sumud Flotilla to their home countries. The prime minister, who was accompanied by Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Ishaq Dar also appreciated Jordan's important role in promoting dialogue, protecting Palestinian rights, and advancing regional peace and stability. The prime minister is visiting Egypt to join the world leaders at the "Summit for Peace" co-chaired by Egyptian President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi and his US counterpart Donald Trump to ensure ending a more than two-year war in Gaza after a breakthrough ceasefire deal brokered by Trump. President Trump, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, President Fattah al-Sisi and Qatar's Amir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani signed the agreement.
